import Mathlib

open Set

lemma holomorphic_locally_injective (U : Set Complex) (f : Complex â†’ Complex)
  (hU : IsOpen U) (hd : DifferentiableOn â„‚ f U) (h' : âˆ€ z âˆˆ U, deriv f z â‰  0) :
  âˆ€ z âˆˆ U, âˆƒ V : Set Complex, IsOpen V âˆ§ z âˆˆ V âˆ§ V âŠ† U âˆ§ (âˆ€ x y, x âˆˆ V â†’ y âˆˆ V â†’ f x = f y â†’ x = y) := by sorry
